ApprovalSubmission.name: ApprovalSubmission
ApprovalSubmission.description: Represents the instance of an approval request that's submitted for a record of the related object.

Comments.description: The comments about the request that's submitted for approval.

DoesSendApprovalEmail.description: Required. Indicates whether approval request emails are sent to approvers and delegates (true) or not (false).

FlowOrchestrationInstanceId.description: The ID of the flow orchestration instance record that's associated with the approval.

Name.description: The auto-generated name for the approval submission.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user or the group that owns the approval submission record.

RelatedRecordId.description: Required. The ID of the related record that's submitted for approval.

RelatedRecordObjectName.description: Required. The type of record that was submitted for approval.

Status.description: Required. The status of the approval.

SubmittedById.description: Required. The ID of the user who submitted the record for approval.
